name: Bee Hwa
text: A double - decker bus ploughed into the kerb and knocked over the traffic light, there are multiple passengers trapped inside and possibly injured

name: Zhen Jia Lat
text: A blue taxi was involved, the taxi swerved to avoid the incoming bus and ended by crashing into a traffic light.The bonnet is damaged and the cabby is seems unconscious.

name: Kua See Mi
text: I saw everything, it was really bad! Please come quickly!

name: Aunn Tee, Karen
text: Luckily no pedestrians were waiting at the traffic light, but it seems the bus has passengers who are in distress.

name: Andy Chan
text: A bus and a taxi nearly crashed into each other head - on but thankfully both vehicles swerved out of the way and no pedestrains were hurt.
